verses.verse: I will extol <S%H7311><s%> you <S%H430><s%>, my God, O king <S%H4428><s%>; and I will bless <S%H1288><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5703><s%>.
Every day <S%H3117><s%> will I bless <S%H1288><s%> you <S%H1984><s%>; and I will praise your name <S%H8034><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5703><s%>.
Great <S%H1419><s%> is the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and greatly <S%H3966><s%> to be praised <S%H1984><s%>; and his greatness <S%H1420><s%> is unsearchable <S%H2714><s%>.
One <S%H1755><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> shall praise <S%H7623><s%> your works <S%H4639><s%> to another <S%H5046><s%>, and shall declare your mighty acts <S%H1369><s%>.
I will speak <S%H7878><s%> of the glorious <S%H3519><s%> honor <S%H1926><s%> of your majesty <S%H1935><s%>, and of your wondrous <S%H6381><s%> works <S%H1697><s%>.
And men shall speak <S%H559><s%> of the might <S%H5807><s%> of your terrible acts <S%H3372><s%>: and I will declare <S%H5608><s%> your greatness <S%H1420><s%>.
They shall abundantly utter <S%H5042><s%> the memory <S%H2143><s%> of your great <S%H7227><s%> goodness <S%H2898><s%>, and shall sing <S%H7442><s%> of your righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is gracious <S%H2587><s%>, and full of compassion <S%H7349><s%>; slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%>, and of great <S%H1419><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%> to all <S%H7356><s%>: and his tender mercies are over all his works <S%H4639><s%>.
All your works <S%H4639><s%> shall praise <S%H3034><s%> you <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord; and your saints <S%H2623><s%> shall bless you <S%H1288><s%>.
They shall speak <S%H559><s%> of the glory <S%H3519><s%> of your kingdom <S%H4438><s%>, and talk <S%H1696><s%> of your power <S%H1369><s%>;
To make known <S%H3045><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> his mighty acts <S%H1369><s%>, and the glorious <S%H3519><s%> majesty <S%H1926><s%> of his kingdom <S%H4438><s%>.
Your kingdom <S%H4438><s%> is a everlasting <S%H5769><s%> kingdom <S%H4438><s%>, and your dominion <S%H4475><s%> endures throughout all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> upholds <S%H5564><s%> all that fall <S%H5307><s%>, and raises up <S%H2210><s%> all those that be bowed down <S%H3721><s%>.
The eyes <S%H5869><s%> of all wait <S%H7663><s%> upon you <S%H5414><s%>; and you give them their food <S%H400><s%> in due season <S%H6256><s%>.
You open <S%H6605><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%>, and satisfiest <S%H7646><s%> the desire <S%H7522><s%> of every living thing <S%H2416><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is righteous <S%H6662><s%> in all his ways <S%H1870><s%>, and holy <S%H2623><s%> in all his works <S%H4639><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> unto all them that call <S%H7121><s%> upon him <S%H7121><s%>, to all that call upon him in truth <S%H571><s%>.
He will fulfill <S%H6213><s%> the desire <S%H7522><s%> of them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him <S%H8085><s%>: he also will hear their cry <S%H7775><s%>, and will save them <S%H3467><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> preserves <S%H8104><s%> all them that love <S%H157><s%> him <S%H7563><s%>: but all the wicked will he destroy <S%H8045><s%>.

My mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> the praise <S%H8416><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: and let all flesh <S%H1320><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> his holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5703><s%>.
